Text:
That is all episodes with Pete Duel!
Very good upload and good quality too. Thank you again :)

Pete Duel was great. The camera loved him and he had great chemistry with Ben Murphy. It was a real tragedy when he committed suicide. The show was never quite as good with Roger Davis imo although still very watchable.

I agree, it was sad.
I just notised that Roger Davis is in episode 2x04 as well, playing a bad guy :)
